jobs.title: UPSBCL AE Recruitment 2025
jobs.brief: UPSBCL has released the new notification for the recruitment of Assistant Engineer (AE) for 57 Posts. Online Registration will be from 7 July 2025 to 7 August 2025.

eligibility.details: B.Tech Degree in Civil / Mechanical Engineering, GATE 2025 Qualified OR Equivalent Eligibility From Any Recognized University/ Board/ Institutions in India.

selectionProcess: Merit List Based on GATE 2025 Score
howToApply: Click on the Apply Online Link below or visit bridgecorporationltd.com.
Fill out the Online Application Form.

jobs.title: RRC Eastern Railway Apprentice Recruitment 2025
jobs.brief: Railway Recruitment Cell (RRC Eastern Railway), has released a short notice on official website for the recruitment of RRC ER Apprentice Post. This recruitment is for 3115 positions. RRC Application Form will start from 07 July 2025 & the candidates can apply till the 08 August 2025. Candidates must check the complete details for RRC Eastern Railway Apprentice Recruitment 2025. which has given below.

ageLimit.asOn: Railway provides age relaxation for the Railway RRC ER Apprentice position as per their regulations. Total Post 3115 Post

howToApply: Interested candidates who wish to apply for the RRC ER post can submit their application online before 08 August 2025.
Use the click here link provided below under important link section to apply directly.
Alternatively, visit the official website of RRC ER to complete the application process online.
Make sure to complete the application before the deadline 08 August 2025.
